events.message: We have received the application from the candidate expressing strong interest in the software engineer position.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering based on the keywords present in their resume such as software and developer.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s application and follow up accordingly.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated a good understanding of software development principles.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the initial screening and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps in the hiring process.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team for the candidate to assess their coding and problem-solving skills.
